sentences.en: " Curb them but don't break their spirits , " was Mrs. Tarleton's motto.
sentences.cn: " 勒住他们,但不要伤了他们的锐气, " 这是塔尔顿夫的箴言.

sentences.en: A large, shiny black limo pulled up to the curb.
sentences.cn: 一辆闪亮的黑色豪华大轿车在路边停下。

sentences.en: He called for much stricter curbs on immigration.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁对移民实行更为严格的限制。

sentences.en: He needs to learn to curb his temper.
sentences.cn: 他得学着控制自己的脾气。

sentences.en: I began to curb my appetite for food and drink.
I could not curb my anger.
I stood at the curb trying to breathe.
sentences.cn: 我站在人行道沿上想缓口气.

sentences.en: measures to curb the spread of the virus
No curb was put either on her words or actions.
sentences.cn: 她说话和行动都随心所俗,不加拘束.

sentences.en: She put a curb on her spending.
Soil conservation is intended to curb erosion.
sentences.cn: 土壤保持旨在控制水土流失。

sentences.en: The boy sat on the curb and watched the cars go by.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩坐在马路边石上看过往的车辆.

sentences.en: The only way to curb this unruly mob is to use tear gas.
sentences.cn: 压制这群暴徒的惟一方法是使用催泪瓦斯.

sentences.en: The public health bureau moved to curb hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 卫生局采取措施控制肝炎.

sentences.en: Wade released the hand brake and pulled away from the curb.
sentences.cn: 韦德松开手刹驶离路边。

sentences.en: We are trying to keep a curb on their activities.
sentences.cn: 我们正设法控制他们的活动。

sentences.en: We can curb juvenile delinquency by education.
sentences.cn: 我们可以通过教育来控制少年犯罪.

sentences.en: You must curb your extravagant tastes.
sentences.cn: 你必须控制自己铺张奢侈的嗜好。
